title: Maher: Trump impeachment scandal is perfect for Halloween season
text:
There's been a ton of analysis about presidential attorney Rudy Giuliani and his search for dirt on Vice President Joe Biden and his son Hunter Biden. The scandal is so layered: There's President Donald Trump's phone call with Ukraine; Giuliani's lunch with two men who were arrested trying to leave the country; and aid money that was used to manipulate a foreign entity.

But what's the seasonal connection?

Late-night comic Bill Maher tells us why this whole quid pro quo, impeachment scandal is the perfect one for Halloween's frights and scares. Watch today's Best of Late Night, above, to get his take.

And Michael Che, of "Saturday Night Live," may have captured the sentiments of the entire nation with his request to take a break from this whole president thing once the impeachment process is over. Find out which Democratic candidate inspired that.

After you watch our favorite jokes, vote for yours in the poll below.

Follow Eileen Rivers on Twitter @msdc14.

This article originally appeared on USA TODAY: Maher: Trump impeachment scandal is perfect for Halloween season
description: A look at Giuliani, Ukraine and Trump with a holiday twist in Best of Late Night
